page.title: Frequently Asked Questions
page.subtitle: Answers to popular questions about our coffee and service

ordering.q1: How do I place an order?
ordering.a1: Select coffee, add to cart and checkout. It takes less than 2 minutes.
ordering.q2: Can I change my order after placing it?
ordering.a2: Yes, contact us within 1 hour of ordering.
ordering.a3: There's no minimum. Order from 1 bag.

delivery_faq.a1: Via Nova Poshta 1-3 days. Orders before 14:00 ship same day.
delivery_faq.a2: Currently we only ship within Ukraine.
delivery_faq.a3: Free from 500₴. Below that — carrier rates.

payment_faq.a1: Card online, Apple Pay, Google Pay, cash on delivery.
payment_faq.q2: Is payment on the site secure?
payment_faq.a2: Yes, we use secure connection and certified payment systems.

products_faq.q1: How long does coffee stay fresh?
products_faq.a1: We recommend drinking within 4-6 weeks after roasting.
products_faq.q2: What's the difference between light and dark roast?
products_faq.a2: Light — more acidity, fruity notes. Dark — bitterness, chocolate tones.
products_faq.a3: Yes, you can choose grind for your brewing method.

subscription_faq.a1: You choose coffee, frequency and volume. We deliver automatically with 10% off.
subscription_faq.q3: How do I change coffee in my subscription?

returns_faq.q1: How do I return an item?
returns_faq.a1: Contact us within 14 days. We'll arrange the return.
returns_faq.q2: Will you refund an opened bag?
returns_faq.a2: If you didn't like the coffee — yes. We value your trust.

contact.title: Didn't find an answer?
contact.text: Write to us and we'll reply within an hour.

faq_page.a_delivery_cost: Delivery is free for orders over 500₴. For orders under 500₴, Nova Poshta delivery cost is 65-85₴ depending on the city. Courier delivery in Odesa (80₴) and Ukrposhta (45₴) are also available.
faq_page.q_delivery_speed: How fast do you ship orders?
faq_page.a_delivery_speed: We roast coffee to order, so shipment takes 1-2 business days. If the order is placed before 14:00 on a business day and the selected variety is in stock - we will ship the same day.
faq_page.q_pickup: Can I pick up my order myself?
faq_page.a_pickup: Yes! Pickup is available at our address in Odesa. Please write to us before visiting so we can prepare your order. Pickup is free.
faq_page.a_what_is_specialty: Specialty coffee is the highest grade of coffee, scoring 80 to 100 points on the SCA (Specialty Coffee Association) scale. Our coffee scores 85+ points, meaning zero defects and a bright, complex flavor profile. This is about 3% of all coffee in the world.
faq_page.a_why_ethiopia: Ethiopia is the birthplace of coffee. Coffee has grown naturally here for thousands of years. Thanks to unique terroir (1800-2200m altitude, volcanic soils), Ethiopian coffee has unique flavor notes: floral, fruity, berry-like, which are not found in coffee from other regions.
faq_page.q_espresso_choice: Which coffee to choose for espresso?
faq_page.a_espresso_choice: For espresso, we recommend medium or dark roast coffee. It gives a fuller body and traditional 'coffee' taste. Sidamo and Harrar varieties are perfect for espresso. If you like brightness - try the light roast Yirgacheffe.
faq_page.a_storage: Store coffee in a sealed package, in a dark place at room temperature. Do not put in the fridge! After opening, try to use within 2-3 weeks. Ground coffee stays fresh for less time - up to 7 days.
faq_page.a_payment_methods: We accept: Visa/Mastercard, Apple Pay, Google Pay, LiqPay, payment to FOP card, and cash on delivery via Nova Poshta (2% commission + 20₴). For B2B clients - bank transfer by invoice.
faq_page.a_online_safe: Yes! We use LiqPay by PrivatBank - one of the most secure payment services. All transactions are protected by 3D Secure. We do not store your card details.
faq_page.a_what_is_sub: A subscription is automatic delivery of your favorite coffee at a selected frequency (1-4 times a month). You save 10% on every delivery, get free shipping, and always have fresh coffee at home.
faq_page.a_cancel_sub: Yes, at any time! No fines or explanations. Just write to us or cancel in your personal account. If you need to skip one delivery - that's also no problem.
faq_page.cta_subtitle: We answer in messengers in 15 minutes
